function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Safety concerns regarding virus spread in workplaces","Risk of being exposed to the virus at work","Construction workers being exposed to covid-19 on construction sites","Proliferation of contagious diseases due to improper cleaning and sanitation processes","Personnel reporting to work after testing positive for the virus","Employers not enforcing social distancing","Inadequate implementation of health and safety guidelines","Lack of temperature monitoring for employees","Lack of adherence to health and safety guidelines","Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines","Inadequate use of safety wearables and carry-ons","Inadequate hygiene and sanitization practices in the workplace","High level of human interactions in the workplace","Inadequate ventilation in built environments","Poor workplace hygiene and sanitation","Contact surfaces such as tables, chairs, doorknobs, handrails, and buttons can act as vectors for contagious diseases due to frequent touching","Virus can stay on surfaces for days, posing a risk of transmission through contaminated materials and equipment","Use of paper in the delivery process may pose a risk of virus transmission, especially if electronic signatures and receipts are not an option","Exposure to the virus at work","Construction workers being exposed to covid-19 due to colleagues testing positive and continuing to work","Non-compliance with mask mandates in the construction industry","Lack of regular communication between construction workers and managers regarding covid-19 concerns","Incomplete or outdated information from osha, cdc, and agc guidelines may lead to ineffective safety practices.","Inadequate implementation of social distancing and hygiene measures within the workplace","Lack of differentiation in safety measures for vaccinated and unvaccinated employees","Inadequate response plan for high-level exposure risk tasks and environments","Possible virus exposure in the workplace due to infected employees.","Inadequate hygiene and sanitization practices in the workplace","Inadequate communication strategy in the tourism industry regarding covid-19 risks","Lack of information for international travelers on reducing covid-19 risks","Potential risk of restoring international tourism without addressing covid-19 travel anxiety and risks, leading to a resurgence of contagious diseases and travel-related transmission.","Spread of novel human coronavirus due to hypermobility and interconnectedness of transport networks.","Asymptomatic travelers exporting infection undetected across international borders","Spread of covid-19 to most countries on earth","Relaxation of restrictions and social distancing measures without proper precautions","Individuals not following public health guidelines","Limited accessibility to active travel options such as walking and cycling","Significant impact on air passenger transport due to global transmission of the virus and travel restrictions","Potential spread of contagious diseases through international transport networks","Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to interconnectedness and interdependencies of everyday life."]}
